title: How do I sort 2 different vector simultaneously
body:
The problem looks very simple, and you may be doing too many things.

Use map<float, pair<int, int>, std::greater<float>>

Insert values from valueVector as key, and pair of values in partnerVector as value.

for(int i = 0; i <= valueVector.size(); i++){
   myMap[valueVector[i]] = make_pair(partnerVector[2*i], partnerVector[2*i+1]);
)
